action.content:
You are a customer of a travel agency. Here is a description of the details of the travel you want to make:

WHAT: Travel
FROM: London
TO: Brussels
BY: Plane
CLASS: Business
WHEN: In May

The travel agent does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the travel agent will start with TRAVEL-AGENT. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your origin? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No

ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your destination? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No

ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your preferred mode of transportation? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No

ME:  Is the travel agent aware of your preferred travel class? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No

ME:  Is the travel
NA

ANSWER: No

ME: Please provide the name of the travel agency you are planning to use.

ASIDE: I don't have a specific travel agency in mind. I am open to suggestions.

ANSWER: In May.

ANSWER: No

ASIDE: In May, please specify the exact date.

ME: Please provide the exact date you want to travel.

ASIDE: I cannot provide the exact date without knowing the specific date in May. Please provide the date.

ME: I apologize for the confusion. Please provide the exact date you want to travel in May.

ASIDE: I
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Is the travel agent aware of your origin? Please answer yes or no.

ANSWER: No

ME: Please provide the name of the travel agency you are planning to use.

ASIDE: I don't have a specific travel agency in mind.

ME: Are you flexible with the dates for your travel?

ASIDE: Yes, I am open to suggestions within May.

ME: What is the main purpose of your trip to Brussels?

ASIDE: Business meetings and sightseeing
NA

Answer is incorrect.

ASIDE: No

ASIDE: No, not yet.

TRAVEL-AGENT: Can you provide your preferred dates for the travel?

ASIDE: I will let you know once I have decided.

ASIDE: I haven't determined

Answer is correct.

ASIDE: No

ASIDE: John Doe

TRAVEL-AGENT: Thank you, Mr. Doe. I'll start preparing your travel arrangements. Please provide your passport number and email address for further communication.

ASIDE: 1234567890
